item.title: Tracy add a quote by Evanescence
item.description: "When you go through tragedy, you can either let that destroy you and you become bitter and never let it go, or you can let it make you stronger and let it make you grow. And that's what I did. My lyrics are coming from a place that I want people to relate to and feel that they're not alone." -- Evanescence

item.title: Tracy add a quote by Robert Ludlum
item.description: "The easiest thing in the world is to convince yourself that you are right. As one grows older, this is easier still." -- Robert Ludlum

item.title: Tracy add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Even an obvious fabrication is some comfort when you have few others." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Tracy add a quote by Eye Tears
item.description: "There are two kinds of secrets; the ones we keep from others and the ones we hide from ourselves." -- Eye Tears

item.title: Tracy add a quote by William C. Moyers
item.description: "It's funny, in a human kind of way, how we can convinces ourselves that we're in control at the very moment we are beginning to lose it." -- William C. Moyers

item.title: Tracy add a quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein
item.description: "Nothing is so difficult as not deceiving oneself." -- Ludwig Wittgenstein

item.title: Tracy add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You can fool yourself, you know. You'd think it's impossible, but it turns out it's the easiest thing of all." -- Jodi Picoult
